description: A hubot scripts that says goodmorning only once and after somebody else has said it
readme:
# hubot-human-goodmorning

A hubot scripts that says goodmorning once day sometime randomly after somebody else has
said it. It'll wait maximum one hour.

## Installation

In hubot project repo, run:

`npm install hubot-human-goodmorning --save`

Then add **hubot-human-goodmorning** to your `external-scripts.json`:

```json
[
  "hubot-human-goodmorning"
]
```

## Configuration

You can limit the responses to one room/channel by setting `MORNING_ROOM_ID`

## Sample Interaction

```
user1>> Good morning
...
sometime later
...
hubot>> Morning people
```

## NPM Module

https://www.npmjs.com/package/hubot-human-goodmorning
